item.title: Day 1: Introduction
item.description: Monday, June 25, 2018 Lecture Videos Morning: Playlist | Day 1, part 1 Afternoon: [Playlist]() | [Day 1, part 1]() Topics History of JavaScript and the Web Getting the most out of a coding bootcamp Mozilla Developer Network (MDN) - An excellent documentation and learning resource for all your HTML/CSS/JS needs Function Hoisting (MDN) Starting a project with git Anatomy of an HTML element (tags, attributes, text content) Basic CSS selector syntax Element name (div, h1, p, etc.
